C F G M P S 

C

ControllerDriver - Class in fmpirate
Driver class which instantiates ControllerGUI on a new thread and cleans up after it by removing the the temporary files created in the ../.temp_files directory while ControllerGUI was alive.
ControllerDriver() - Constructor for class fmpirate.ControllerDriver
 
ControllerGUI - Class in fmpirate
GUI window to select a playlist file and interact with the Playlist and PlaylistManager classes to create and shuffle bash-executable WAV playlists and broadcast them over FM radio.
ControllerGUI(String, Dimension, String) - Constructor for class fmpirate.ControllerGUI
Sets the title and size of the JFrame to be displayed, initializes and adds all content to the JFrame and registers listeners for the GUI's various interactive components before finally making it visible.

F

fmpirate - package fmpirate
 

G

getPath() - Method in class fmpirate.Playlist
Why doesn't java just have getter/setter properties by now?
getPath() - Static method in class fmpirate.PlaylistManager
 

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class fmpirate.ControllerDriver
main attempts to recreate essential directories if they have been removed and instantiates an instance of ControllerGUI on a new thread.

P

play(String) - Static method in class fmpirate.PlaylistManager
Sets the content of tempPath to the string passed and calls play() to attempt to bash-execute the playlist file specified by tempPath using playlistProcess.
play() - Static method in class fmpirate.PlaylistManager
Attempts to bash-execute the playlist file specified by tempPath using playlistProcess.
Playlist - Class in fmpirate
Class which reads a text file and parses the name of the WAV file and the gain to be applied when broadcasting that file and prints a bash-executable script which can play each audio file with the specified gain over the FM frequency passed to the class constructor.
Playlist(String, String) - Constructor for class fmpirate.Playlist
The constructor creates a bash-executable script in "../.temp_files".
PlaylistManager - Class in fmpirate
This class provides the play, stop, and shuffle logic to the ControllerGUI.
PlaylistManager() - Constructor for class fmpirate.PlaylistManager
 

S

shuffle(String, String) - Static method in class fmpirate.PlaylistManager
Reads a bash-executable playlist and replaces the frequency in each line with the new frequency passed to the method and stores each non-blank line to the String ArrayList, playList.
stop() - Static method in class fmpirate.PlaylistManager
Attempts to destroy the current playlistProcess and attempts to then kill SoX (which will otherwise continue to run) using playlistProcess.
